long_description: The Monstapods Roof Box Sticker Kit turns your car's rooftop box into a shark or whale with eyes, teeth and other "body part" stickers that you can easily apply to your roof box. Shark stickers look best on gray or silver cargo boxes; orca whale stickers look best on black boxes. Kit also includes a unique tag number, just like scientists use to track animals in the wild. Monstapods donates a portion of the proceeds from the Roof Box Sticker Kit to shark or whale research.
short_description: The Monstapods Roof Box Sticker Kit turns your car's rooftop box into a shark or whale with eyes, teeth and other "body part" stickers that you can easily apply to your roof box.
